thread.title: 9 photos of hot Krishna Shroff are a must see than so-called ‘topless’ pictures!
thread.title_full: 9 photos of hot Krishna Shroff are a must see than so-called ‘topless’ pictures!

author: Rashmi Mishra
title: 9 photos of hot Krishna Shroff are a must see than so-called ‘topless’ pictures!
text:
9 photos of hot Krishna Shroff are a must see than so-called ‘topless’ pictures! By Rashmi Mishra on October 18, 2015 at 2:34 PM Comments Krishna Shroff, a star kid is soon climbing the stairs of stardom. To do so, she has not taken the routine way of entering the entertainment world but tried her hands on being the internet celeb. It is relatively a new concept in India or rather a confused one because of the sexy starlets Poonam Pandey, Sofia Hayat or Sherlyn Chopra. But thanks to Bollywood actor Tiger Shroff’s younger sister, we may start have our very own culture of appreciating great and aesthetically photographs on the social media. Also See: 13 sexy pictures of Krishna Shroff will prove why you should follow her on Instagram! The 22-year-old daughter of talented actor Jackie Shroff has been creating a buzz in the online world with her choice of pictures shared on it. The girl with brown hair and light eyes, Krishna has not shied away from posting the photographs just like any normal girl of her age does. Admitting of getting noticed by media because of her star-kid status, she stands by her independent and perceived ‘bold’ lifestyle. Also Read: Krishna Shroff clears air about ‘topless’ pictures; says she didn’t show nipple! Krishna who goes by the handle kishushroff on Instagram boasts of more than 83 thousand followers on the photo sharing platform. The pictures range from the one clicked along with her family to fun times captured like partying with friends to gorgeous photoshoots. She has also shared pictures of her alleged boyfriend who could be seen with the gorgeous girl either kissing or cajoling. The photo shoots which shot Krishna to fame were touted to be topless but Krishna denied them to be anything of that sort. She cleared about them and said a picture needs to show nipple in order to be called nipple. Krishna feels it is a little backward of people to react it in this manner (calling pictures ‘topless). Fair enough. Hopefully, with Krishna we could see a rise in the following of internet celebs just like the West boasts of Kendall Jenner or Cara Delevingne. Well, you never know.
